Confirmations Tracking

BACK

Currently Mirvac's confirmations are hard to trace. Sometimes they confirm dates before the day that is requested and then when that day comes they appear to take no action. I have caught this a few times already to which without dedicating a recource for the soul purpose of Mirvac confirmations can get extremely confusing and unorganised. 

By using the sheet below, this way you can constantly update every time Mirvac sends a confirmation sheet as they insert days when its not required. When something has gone out and the site team didnt require it, then you can open just one document and locate the control code and find which date it was confirmed for. 

This method will save on the dedicated resource and also time of the current resource. This also makes Mirvac more accountable with their accuracy when doing the confirmations.

Confirmations Tracking PDF

Created by Daniel Melluso
